movie.title: Inherent Vice
movie.writer: Paul Thomas Anderson (written for the screen by), Thomas Pynchon (based on the novel by)
movie.actors: Joanna Newsom, Katherine Waterston, Joaquin Phoenix, Jordan Christian Hearn
movie.plot: During the psychedelic 60s and 70s Larry "Doc" Sportello is surprised by his former girlfriend and her plot for her billionaire boyfriend, his wife, and her boyfriend. A plan for kidnapping gets shaken up by the oddball characters entangled in this groovy kidnapping romp based upon the novel by Thomas Pynchon.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 27 wins & 59 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: Inherent Vice may prove frustrating for viewers who demand absolute coherence, but it does justice to its acclaimed source material -- and should satisfy fans of director P.T. Anderson.
